name: Ultramarine RS 02
description: Ultramarine RS 02 is a medium tinting strength Ultramarine blue with a very green undertone. It is heat fast, lightfast, easy to disperse and approved worldwide for use in sensitive applications such as food contact plastics and cosmetics.Ultramarine RS 02 is widely used alone to obtain a bright, transparent shade of blue, or in combination with other pigments such as titanium dioxide, with which it gives an attractive pastel shade.Ultramarine RS 02 is intended as a general purpose pigment with applications in paint, ink, soap, cosmetics and many other industries. Ultramarine RS 02 can be used in plastics.
